comment: She was very nice and helpful, but her ppt & lectures did not reflect test material at all. Also, this was her first college teaching job and it seems she did not like it very much. She even had a copy of a negotiation letter for a high school teaching job she had just been hired for attached to the last study guide, so her focus was not on us :(
Talk about the most amazing teacher, she really inspired me to work hard and learn more about chemistry. She is awesome!!!!! Im sad to see she is leaving :(
Great Professor... sad that she will not be here for future semesters.  Yes she was used to teaching high school but in my opinion that only made the class easier!  Good Luck Meisa! We will miss you

has an interesting style of clothing....her worksheets are helpful, but she used to teach highschool so she treats all of us like we are in high school! this is college, stop treating us like children!
